```py
import numpy as np

# Generate x values
x = np.linspace(0, 10, 20)

# Generate y values
y = np.sin(x)
y2 = np.cos(x)
```

```py
import mplcyberpunk

plt.style.use('cyberpunk')
plt.figure(figsize = (8,8))

plt.scatter(x, y, marker = 'o')
mplcyberpunk.make_scatter_glow()

plt.scatter(x, y2, marker = 'o', c='lime')
mplcyberpunk.make_scatter_glow()

plt.xlabel('X-Axis')
plt.ylabel('Y-Axis')

plt.show()
```

```py
plt.style.use('cyberpunk')
plt.figure(figsize = (8,8))

plt.plot(x, y, marker = 'o')
plt.plot(x, y2, marker = 'o', c='lime')

mplcyberpunk.make_lines_glow()

plt.xlabel('X-Axis')
plt.ylabel('Y-Axis')

plt.show()
```

```py
plt.style.use('cyberpunk')
plt.figure(figsize = (8,8))

plt.plot(x, y, marker = 'o')
plt.plot(x, y2, marker = 'o', c='lime')

mplcyberpunk.add_gradient_fill(alpha_gradientglow=0.5, gradient_start='zero')

plt.xlabel('X-Axis')
plt.ylabel('Y-Axis')

plt.show()
```

```py
 import matplotx

with plt.style.context(matplotx.styles.dracula):
  plt.scatter(x, y, c=y2)

  plt.colorbar(label='Y2')
  plt.xlabel('X')
  plt.ylabel('Y')
  plt.show()
```

```py
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotx

with plt.style.context(matplotx.styles.pitaya_smoothie['dark']):
  plt.plot(x, y, marker='o')
  plt.plot(x, y2, marker='o')

  plt.xlabel('X')
  plt.ylabel('Y')
  plt.show()
```

```py
plt.scatter(x, y, c=y2)

plt.colorbar(label='Y2')
plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Y')
plt.show()
```

```py
mpl_style(dark=True)

plt.plot(x, y, marker='o')
plt.plot(x, y2, marker='o')

plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Y')
plt.show()
```

```py
import scienceplots

with plt.style.context(['science', 'high-vis']):
    plt.figure(figsize = (6,6))
    plt.plot(x, y, marker='o', label='Line 1')
    plt.plot(x, y2, marker='o', label='Line 2')

    plt.xlabel('X')
    plt.ylabel('Y')
    plt.legend()
    plt.show()
```
